subject: Baseball
Left-Handedness
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox believe that Billy Wagner, a 38-year-old left-hander with a surgically repaired elbow, can be another solid arm in their bullpen, but closer Jonathan Papelbon isn’t sure.
snippet: The Red Sox believe that Billy Wagner, a 38-year-old left-hander with a surgically repaired elbow, can be another solid arm in their bullpen, but closer Jonathan Papelbon isn’t sure.
